description:
Mozuku is a Chuunin from http://anidb.net/ch8864 [Konohagakure]. He acts as one of the proctors during the written portion of the Chuunin Exams, watching out for signs of cheating. He later fetches http://anidb.net/ch10929 [Mitarashi Anko] when Team Shiore is found dead.
In the anime, he, Anko and Iwashi are seen on a mission shortly before Anko senses http://anidb.net/ch8603 [Orochimaru]`s death. Mozuku, along with http://anidb.net/ch17690 [Tobitake Tonbo] and http://anidb.net/ch17691 [Hijiri Shimon], facilitate in http://anidb.net/ch10962 [Yamanaka Inoichi]`s Mind Reading of http://anidb.net/ch17695 [Yuudachi]. When the invasion of Pain starts, they help distract the http://anidb.net/ch17693 [Animal Path] to give Inoichi a chance to analyse what he has learned.
name: Mozuku
